title: Soledad O’Brien
description: Samantha Bee talks to cable news legend and Twitter ‘boss lady’ Soledad O’Brien about her love/hate relationship with the journalism industry and gets some advice on how to create the perfect "podcasting voice" and how to choose the best murder venue.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
content:encoded: Samantha Bee talks to cable news legend and Twitter ‘boss lady’ Soledad O’Brien about her love/hate relationship with the journalism industry and gets some advice on how to create the perfect "podcasting voice" and how to choose the best murder venue.
